document.full_text: the inspired boston bruins continued to punish the vancouver canucks for a vicious hit that knocked nathan horton out of the stanley cup finals, rolling to a 4-0 win wednesday that leveled the series at 2-2.
document.title: horton hit inspires bruins to tie stanley cup
lines_and_colors: the inspired boston bruins continued to punish the vancouver canucks for a vicious hit that knocked nathan horton out of the stanley cup finals, rolling to a 4-0 win wednesday that leveled the series at 2-2.
